channel.title: How to tweak combat system/+ formula
channel.description:
im using yon's 4.1 easy rsc...
wat i was wondering was this, how would i be able to change the combat system itself. you know how a level can gain 2 attack,or strength etc, without leveling to combat level 4. I would like to change that, and lets to make it that a level 3 can gain 3 attack, or strength etc, without leveling to combat level 4.
another problem i have, if its possible to raise hp level, without gaining combat (like sending "null", into the method, that checks more than 1 hp level gain = combat level)
sorry, i know this is a bit confusing, and i appreciate ur patience here with me

item.title: How to tweak combat system/+ formula
item.dc:creator: @mans2 mans2
item.description:
@mans2 wrote:

sorry i re edited, thanks for the input

Read full topic
item.source: How to tweak combat system/+ formula

item.title: How to tweak combat system/+ formula
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“mans2, post:1, topic:355472”]using yon’s 4.1 easy rsc…
wat i would like to implement is this, change the combat leveling system, in which 3 levels = 1 combat, to maybe 6 skills 1= combat

but i should state my end goal im trying to achieve, i want two guys, one with 95 hp 40 att and 80 str, to be at same combat level as 80 range 70 def… etc etc… if anyone can help it would be of great pleasure…[/quote]

I dont understand what you’re saying…

Read full topic
item.source: How to tweak combat system/+ formula
